text: Palau at the Olympics is a history which includes 4 games in 4 countries and 13+ athletes.SportsReference.com (SR/Olympics), "Palau" ; retrieved 2012-7-27. Since 1997, Palau (PLW) has contributed to the growth of the "Olympic Movement".Olympics.org, "Factsheet: The Olympic Movement"; retrieved 2012-7-27. ==History== The Palau National Olympic Committee was formed in 1997. It was recognized by the International Olympic Committee in 1998.Olympic.org, Palau; retrieved 2012-7-27. Palau's team first competed at the 2000 Summer Olympics in Sydney. ==Medalists== ===Summer games=== Palau at the Summer Olympics Palau at the Summer Olympics Palau at the Summer Olympics Palau at the Summer Olympics Palau at the Summer Olympics Palau at the Summer Olympics Year Athletes Gold Silver Bronze Total 2000 5 0 0 0 0 2004 4 0 0 0 0 2008 5 0 0 0 0 ==Related pages== * List of IOC country codes ==References== == Other websites == *Palau National Olympic Committee website * Palau profile at London2012.com Category:Nations at the Olympics Category:Palau
title: Palau at the Olympics
